summary: Adds a witcher race similar to the one from Andrzej Sapkowsky\'s novels, the movie and the games.
descriptionHtml:
Adds a new race and 5 signs. 

Race:
Skill bonuses:
Two-handed +10
Light Armor +10
Alchemy +5
Smithing +5
Enchanting +5

Abilities:
Aard (Unrelenting Force Level 2 - Fus, Ro)
Quen (Storm Cloak)
Yrden (Storm Rune)
Igni (Fire Breath Level 2 - Yol, Toor)
Axii (Frenzy)

Plans:
- Add master level signs
- Add witcher swords

Bugs and problematic issues:
- Igni doesn\'t show up in the spells menu
author: Modger99
